statements: SELECT * FROM users;

SELECT u.username, u.email, ui.interaction_type FROM users u INNER JOIN user_interactions ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id;
SELECT u.username, ui.interaction_type FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_interactions ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id WHERE ui.interaction_time >= '2022-01-01';
